name: At the edge of acceptance
description:
Coranavirus lockdown locked Morgan with their family. Non-binary in the closet, they feel that time, away from their trans friends, eating their mind. 

Now only an inhabitant of the forest can help them.

So travel with Morgan and find the proctetion you deserve.
___________________

This game was created for the non-binary game jam of April 2021. Everything is made by me, except the sound of the forest that were done by klankbeeld (https://freesound.org/people/klankbeeld/)

Let's all note I found a way to avoid needing my awful drawing skills : pictures.

French translation to come !!
